[[File:US 212 looking west from Vista Point, Montana .jpg|thumb|The [[Beartooth Highway]] heading into the [[Beartooth Mountains]] ]][[File:Red Lodge Palisades.jpg|thumb|The Palisades area on the north end of the ski area at [[Red Lodge Mountain Resort]]]][[File:Pictograms-nps-land-skateboarding.svg|The Downtown Billings skateboard park is open all year round]][[File:Discs in basket.jpg|thumb|[[Disc golf]] basket.]]
Activities in and around Billings include [[hiking]], [[rock climbing]], [[mountain climbing]], [[fishing]], [[skiing]], [[boating]], [[disc golf]], [[skateboarding]], the Downtown Skateboard Park, [[motorcycle trials]], [[golf]], [[mountain biking]], [[rappelling]], extensive walking and bike trails, art walks, concerts, food fairs and [[rodeos]]. Some annual events include:
